<languages/> '''Badges''' are unlockables for your [[Trainer Card (Discord)|trainer card]] for the game's [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord]. They have no in-game function, and are used for bragging rights.
==Badges==
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Badge !! How to Unlock |- | Boulder [[File:Boulder_Badge.png|15px]] || Buy something in the [[profile shop]] |- | Cascade [[File:Cascade_Badge.png|15px]] || Use the [[bot commands]] 1,000 times |- | Thunder [[File:Thunder_Badge.png|15px]] || Send 2,500 messages in the server |- | Rainbow [[File:Rainbow_Badge.png|15px]] || Win at least a 5,000 coin profit in the Discord [[Game-Corner (Discord)|Game-Corner]] |- | rowspan=2 | Marsh [[File:Marsh_Badge.png|15px]] || Either play games in the Game-Corner 1,000 times |- || Or answer 100 questions in the bot-coins channel |- | Soul [[File:Soul_Badge.png|15px]] || Reach a Balance of over 25,000 coins |- | Volcano [[File:Volcano_Badge.png|15px]] || Reach a [[Discord Commands|timely]] streak of over 500 |- | Earth [[File:Earth_Badge.png|15px]] || Reach a [[Discord Commands|daily]] streak of over 100 |}
